website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you prefer stainless steel cookware; otherwise, consider others on our list if you want nonstick surfaces.
pros: A sleek, attractive stainless steel set with 12 pieces
Handles are riveted for lasting use
cons: Though they have raised interior surfaces for improved food release, they aren't non-stick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: As a Chef - this is an amazing deal for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The pots and pans might look great but they do not last! I’ve had these since July 20th it is now September 13th and they are in horrible condition. They did not last all. They’re rusting and I honestly hate cooking my food on it. Really disappointing. These don’t seem like stainless steel to me!
customer_reviews.author: Cycy

customer_reviews.title: Found one in a discount store and tried it.
customer_reviews.text: Found one in a discount store and tried it. I was intending to get rid of all my teflon and these fit the replacement bill wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Toni Vicalvi

customer_reviews.title: Cure with Heated OIL and Paper Towel after wash!
customer_reviews.text: The set is so nice, every pan, every piece needs washed, heated with a little olive oil in them, and wiped out with a paper towel. Once you do this, you basically have nonstick cookware without the teflon poisoning. I read that like 90% of the US population has teflon in there blood.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Finally moved and opened, seem a little thin but ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally moved and opened, seem a little thin but I will update the post once I start cooking on my induction stove top....stay tuned! Update: I added a star. Only complaint is I wish the large two handled pot also had silicone handles. Otherwise they are suiting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lamirata

customer_reviews.title: Love my new set!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I wanted the smooth stainless steel exterior and interior. Clean up is easy but remember to oil your pans otherwise food sticks. If it does stick let it disk fir awhile and it comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Nengle

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I left my old set of 18/10 cookware with my former roommate so I needed a new set. I did a lot of research and it seemed like this was a very good value. Although I was a bit hesitant I did go ahead and order. I'm very pleasantly surprised with the quality of the pots and pans. I love that I can use the mixer in them and not have to transfer to another dish. The 5-quart Dutch oven is the perfect size for soup. Very happy with my purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kvittum

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pans, everything sticks!
customer_reviews.text: These are somemof the worst pans I've ever owned. The construction is good quality, but their performance is abysmal. Regardless how much heat or oil is applied, anything placed into the pan sticks instantly, coating the bottom in charred food remnants and preventing anything from cooking without making a giant mess that is incredibly hard to scrub off.
customer_reviews.author: Morty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Owned Tfal satinless forever
customer_reviews.text: I own an older model of th Tfal stainless steel set . Absolutely love it. cant be beat. so much that I bought my daughter this set.. looks and cooks fabulously ..guess whos making thanksgiving dinner this year? not me. hahaha
customer_reviews.author: rhondajones

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These pots get dirty very easily but worst thing is that they are impossible to clean. The pictures are from first use and I cannot manage to clean them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Novev

customer_reviews.title: Handles are a little weak
customer_reviews.text: Aside from ALL the handles being a little weak these perform very well when cooking. I noticed the handles were weak while cleaning them. I don't think they'll just break off, but be cautious when handling the handles. Overall, they heat evenly in no time using induction. Haven't tried them on the stove yet. The clean up is fairly easy. I use Barkeeper's Friend. Been using them daily for over a month now. They still have their shine & luster.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cookware
customer_reviews.text: I love the no heat handles, the beveled lip for easy pouring liquids, the chrome finish its stainless steel so it's a safe alternative. The only drawback would be you'll have to season them often so that they become nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: A new stove calls for new pans
customer_reviews.text: These pans work on our new stove that is an induction stove. These pan work great are lightweight and clean up great. I wish we had a maid some days as we are so busy... but don't we all wish for a maid? We have used the pans for just about every meal you can think of and I have even burned a few things and we have gotten the pans clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooking good.
customer_reviews.text: I like them very much, and they're just what I needed. I also like that there are measurement markings inside the pots.
customer_reviews.author: Carolane

customer_reviews.title: Wish I liked these
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful, but two years later I still really dislike these pans and wish I never wasted my money on them. Everything sticks when cooking, no matter how much oil or non-stick spray we use. Also very difficult to clean. The pots are fine; it's the pans that are useless for us.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Good pots and pans for a good price
customer_reviews.text: They’re not the best but they definetly aren’t the worst. These pots are good for a starter set. They need a Brillo pad to clean. It has turned a weird color on some of the pans. I’m not sure it’s its from misuse or the cleaning wasn't properly done. Got it a gift for my sister when she moved into her first house.
customer_reviews.author: Jayda

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks.
customer_reviews.text: By looking at them, they were great. Heated evenly and quickly, love the design. I have cooked for seven days straight. Used all pans except the steamer and the large pot. EVERYTHING STICKS. a sauce stuck, meat sticks, chicken sticks, potstickers stuck (when boiling in water), vegetables stuck, onions peppers, and even pasta. EVERYTHING. I have followed all manufacture instructions. Nothing on high heat. If I still had the box I would return it. Will be buying a new, different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Great pans though
customer_reviews.text: Coming from nonstick pans to these is rough. Food sticks and will burn because these get HOT quick! Great pans though!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I'm raving to all my friends and family about these! The best pots and pans I have ever used or owned! Chef status! Also, I love that there isn't any gross toxic coating. I love how quickly these heat up. Love that the are induction safe and I love how they are dishwasher safe AND they are BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks. Use vinegar.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t matter what we did, everything stuck. Cook on low, it stuck. Cook on medium, it stuck. Cook on high, it stuck. Vinegar helps to remove most of the stuck on stuff, it will never come fully clean. I ignored the other reviews and now I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Holtphens

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few weeks and we have been very happy with how they preform
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them for a few weeks and we have been very happy with how they preform. Make sure to review how to cook I’m stainless steel before cooking. So things won’t stick! Great purchase! Good quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jade P.

customer_reviews.title: Like them so much!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of cookware! Its been a couple of month and i have use them in regular basis and no trouble at all! Thank Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Torrales

customer_reviews.title: Great pans with nice thick bottoms!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heat them up correctly and use a good quality oil and you can cook the world in these... only thing I don’t like cooking is eggs in there I have a smooth one for that.
customer_reviews.author: Makyver

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Since there is no outer box, my box arrived a bit damaged so if you are giving this as a gift please ask amazon to put an outer box or wrap it somehow. I use them on an induction cooker and heat up evenly and fast. They are not heavy so is fairly easy to handle. They also look great!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimer!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. It seems to conduct heat very well, and is easy to clean. They also look very professional, and have impressed friends with the look and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, easy clean, covers get hot,so hot pad needed.
customer_reviews.text: Food does stick if there is not enough cooking spray, but the clean up is super easy. Watch out, however, because the handles on the tops get HOT so use a hot pad. Great looking set.
customer_reviews.author: Youree Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are great, but they are a little hard to clean after use
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for a family member
customer_reviews.text: Will have to wait to write a review since it's a christmas
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: cooks food evenly
customer_reviews.text: very easy to clean and cooks food evenly. no hot spots
customer_reviews.author: alexander rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with all cooktops and ovens
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as described. Beautiful in my kitchen and live that I can use it with induction cooking source. So versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Alendra Saltzman

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: they wont last forever and kinda cheap quality but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: The Man and the legend

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this was not a good buy for me. They are sturdy, but burn easily and are not non stick. I have had to go out and purchase another set to replace this set. The boiling pots are fine, the 2 fry pans do not cook well.
customer_reviews.author: Lenitra E Ray

customer_reviews.title: Don' Buy it at all
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use it for what I thought it made for and that is cooking and it fail on all levels it suppose to be a non stick product but it was not and it burns from the sides when you put it on the stove it is just a bad product and gets no stars from me and wish I hadn't purchase it at all I got so mad I throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this for every day use.
customer_reviews.text: The sauce pans are ok to use as we mostly steam or boil it. The fry pans gets hot too quickly.when I use for stir fry, I need to use good amount of oil, otherwise it gets stock to it and gets burnt. Also for washing I need to use steel sponge to remove.
customer_reviews.author: vinaythunga

customer_reviews.title: horrible choice!
customer_reviews.text: this pot set was extremely disappointing! everything gets burned and everything sticks to them. horrible choice!
customer_reviews.author: c soto

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they are light weight, easy to clean, just the right size. Can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks every time.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very disappointed in this product from day one. Everything sticks, there’s not one time I used this cookware and there wasn’t anything to soak off the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Sherone C

customer_reviews.title: Use only on low temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware these pots can only be used on low to medium low heat. I have only had these pots for a couple of weeks and there are burnt marks on them. Also food sticks to the pan, so clean up is a little more extensive. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tayina

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: wanted something without non stick coating, have tried ceramic pans but they don't last, these pans are well made and durable
customer_reviews.author: Veronica V. Flematti

customer_reviews.title: Food still burns
customer_reviews.text: Still manages to burn sometimes but for the most part it is okay. I think it'll last a long time but only time will tell. I'd give 4 stars but my food still burns so its 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: These pots are pretty much worthless after a week or so. They are definitely NOT non-stick and not stainless steel. Very hard to clean. Wouldnt recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: Tarek

customer_reviews.title: Love...handles on lids get hot so be careful 😉
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Easy to clean. Just be careful with the lids. The handles get very hot so you’ll need to use a dish towel or something so you don’t burn your hands.
customer_reviews.author: LorrieAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure with durability but easy to clean and.good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jemelyn Ching

customer_reviews.title: awesome pans
customer_reviews.text: great pans for the price. no issues like other were describing
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Abanto

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: The set is complete, with all of the pieces that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't find it as i expected it!
customer_reviews.text: i trusted the brand so much i didn't read it all the way, once i received i learn it is NOT non stick. i was a bit disappointed to be honest. T-FAL is a great brand and would Never thought they would sell this kind.
customer_reviews.author: Mehret Belayneh

customer_reviews.title: I love this cookware
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware! It saves energy, as I don't have to turn the heat very high to thoroughly cook my food!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my mom for Christmas she loved it
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: NOT best pot set
customer_reviews.text: i purchased two sets one for myself and the other as a gift for my stepdaughter as a house warming gift after the very use the pan discolors its mentioned that its stainless steel 18/10 i picked this for the durability i believe it was cheaply made i dont recommed this set
customer_reviews.author: MELIGENIA OLIVARES

customer_reviews.title: it stains pretty quick such that although it is dishwasher safe - ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it does the job, it stains pretty quick such that although it is dishwasher safe - the dishwasher can't get the "stain" effect out. And even though it is not non-stick, even burnt on food comes off without a problem. For the price I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David Altman

customer_reviews.title: Good set for this price
customer_reviews.text: Good set for this price. Four stars because the texture on some pans does not help with sticking and makes it really harder to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alisson Da Mota Santos

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Everything sticks to these. I don’t even use them, literally a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: faryn schwartz

customer_reviews.title: These pans are not safe.
customer_reviews.text: I cooked eggs as my 1st use and there were pieces of stainless steel all over the eggs! I was shocked! Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lynn Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my son. He seemed to like it
customer_reviews.author: Tashi Saari

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT non stick
customer_reviews.text: Everything sticks horribly I have to go buy new pans already
customer_reviews.author: gabbi Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and pans. I’ve washed and used several times and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality set of pots that fit my needs. Though they are non stick but still work well to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Adejoke Boore

customer_reviews.title: Pans are very hard to clean, almost everthing sticks to pans
customer_reviews.text: the pots are good, works well with induction. Pans very sticky to food and really difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Raari

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything ok. But is necessary follow the instructions correctly in reference at the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not say there was aluminum in the pans themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Too much money for the quality, burns easy and food sticks.. its like a toy pots and pans set.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Scott

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Good set of pans for the price. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: DoddiGoordman

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and light
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it’s much lighter than my iron clad
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hoori

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots and pans. They’re easy to clean and I rarely have anything that sticks to the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Could be better without the gimmicky pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, even heating. These pots and pans are pretty good at what they do. However, the techno-release does not really work that well and is pretty annoying. I would much prefer smooth bottoms because those are easier to clean when food inevitably get stuck to the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this set for about 2 months now. The saucepans are awesome and easy to clean. The pans are harder to use because I have only cooked with non-stick pans before but after watching some videos off youtube I'm getting the hang of it. Cooking meat is really much better and doesn't even require oil or butter. Also, cleaning them is super easy. Finally, I was really annoyed with the handles of my previous set that were getting loose so I really appreciate the riveted handles. Bottom line, I have looked at a lof of sets and I'm really glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R.

customer_reviews.title: Food Sticks to Bottom
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even try to make pancakes with them. It turned my breakfast into a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: AlG

customer_reviews.title: food sticks to the pans
customer_reviews.text: the pans are not looking too good after a few months. They look black. They're hard to cook with and the food sticks to the pan unless you use a TON of oil. The sauce pans are nice though!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pans clean well, however the way the lids are ...
customer_reviews.text: Pans clean well, however the way the lids are made, they DO NOT clean well! Food gets stuck underneath rim and there is no way to get to it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking - feel high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great looking - feel high quality. I have only used the pots so far, and I am very happy with them. If there are quality issues in the future I will update my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg M Szafran

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by T-fal
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I use this pan, and I just spent 15 minuets trying to get this off and it won’t. I tried soap, salt, baking soda, everything, and this the best I can do with it. I regretted buying this. I thought T-fal was the best between competitors.
customer_reviews.author: RFH

customer_reviews.title: read the reviews and they are great. If food is stuck
customer_reviews.text: I searched and found these, read the reviews and they are great. If food is stuck, i just boil hot water after it comes right off and clean up is easy. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: Needed new set of pots to replace old ones which were non stick and coating now no longer on the pots, and used in our RV. They look great all shiny and clean and the only pan I used was the frypan for scrambled eggs. The eggs stuck and the pan discolored from being on the heat .Customer service with Amazon prime was great. I knew they were inexpensive and expected to get at least one year of use .The poor performance of the frypan was disappointing but not unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: c.holman

customer_reviews.title: For the price, deal of the century!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It works so well. I have tried cooking on gas and induction cooktops and this set performs well in both scenarios. The no stick technology works as advertised. Very little sticking and they are easy to clean. The lids are made of nice glass and have sturdy handles. This kit has everything you need to cook all sorts of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Handles poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the sharp edges at the end of the pan handles that grab your attention every time you pickup the pot or pan. They should have curled the handle end edges inward. Secondly the handles have limited structure and strength at the attachment point with the pot/pan and I am concerned the handles may bend at some time in the future. Lastly the customer service website is not maintained to include all model numbers which delayed registration until customer service was contacted. Overall, I'm not convinced I made a good purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: I have not been happy at all work your cookware
customer_reviews.text: I have not been happy at all work your cookware. Everything I cook sticks in the skillet and it take alot of effort to get the food out of the pain. It stains also and I can't get the stains off
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Even thought it says non-stick. It sticks and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Even thought it says non-stick. It sticks and it leaves black marks all over. It happens everytime I use it. So it's false advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: K.C

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best price and quality Not heavy not light the weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best price and quality Not heavy not light the weight is just right Love the set !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Han J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Better for your glass cooktop
customer_reviews.text: I was advised to use stainless steel cookware on my glass cooktop. The heat spreads out more evenly. I was told by a Sears repairman working on my dishwasher, that using any other cookware on a glass cooktop over time can leave metal specks imbedded into the glass. My first use was making an omelette. I used olive oil, I was skeptical on using stainless steel. I was quite surprised at the outcome and that no egg stuck to the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie522

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get clean
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this set of T-fal SS set. It replaced a SS set that I used for over 30 years. I researched replacement pots and pans and decided on T-fal. After a couple of weeks of use they already look used and they do not get clean whether I hand wash or use the dishwasher. The pans feel scummy and sticky and the lids are always cloudy. The small skillet has a coating from cooking oil that cannot be removed and the large skillets lid doesn't fit. I will never buy T-fal products again. I will be replacing this set, I am sure, in the next few months. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Koons

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Price for quality and number of pieces
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Price for all the pieces you get. Cleans up easy too!
customer_reviews.author: SensibleStacey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Product is very sturdy and washes easily either in the sink or the dishwasher. I now have a pot and pan sized for anything I want to cook now. Even a small squad pot to make gravy. Wonderful addition to my kitchen appliances collection.
customer_reviews.author: Obsessed Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up very easy, Browns up meat perfect. Cooks eggs in the small fry pan with a little non stick spray and they came out perfect. Bought this for a portable induction cooker and this combination works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Weed

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheep set for a reason. They won’t last forever there all kinda under size. Great maybe as a steppingstone to a way better set but they will not be the last pans you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Austin A. Spiker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are built really well. They heat up quick and adjust to temperature really well. They also look classy.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Light weight perfect for an RV works well and water boils a little faster than with more heavy duty pots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: You must season your pan before using. Learn how to use stainless steel and you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Bloody_Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Wow, never have been so impressed with pots and pans!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, the way they cook. Bye, bye, black coated pans!!
customer_reviews.author: BJA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that everything gets stuck to them Honestly not worth the price If I could return them I would.
customer_reviews.author: Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Much heavier then most in this price range. Only used a few times but they heat super quick and clean easy!!

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Sent back. The handles get hot, they do not clean up well.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband does the cooking and he loves this cookware!
customer_reviews.author: GMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sister. All is good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelah

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE. Very dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Lid completely shattered on low heat. Very dangerous. Look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Joh

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I bought it to use on a induction
customer_reviews.text: This is great . I bought it to use on a induction plate
customer_reviews.author: John Hodskins

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Heats good great portable stoves at cabin won’t warp. Nothing sticks inside. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Oman

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that food still sticks to bottom with oil or spray... Love the sizes and how lightweight they are...
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Burns at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: These pots burn at the bottom really easy. I cook on medium and low heat . These pots still burn at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Further Feedback Coming
customer_reviews.text: Just received this set. I will return to give further review, I just wanted to offer pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Crool

customer_reviews.title: much better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Long story short, I was impressed. The handle was made of steel but it was not hot 95% chance that you can confidently grasp it. Not very sticky, much better than I thought it would. Looks very durable. Used for roughly a month and I'm very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guo J.

product_meta.title: T-fal Pro E760SC Performa Stainless Steel Dishwasher Oven Safe Cookware Set, 12-Piece, Silver, 0
product_meta.description: Style Name:Stainless Steel HandleT-fal's Performa cookware solves the problems of cooking with stainless steel! Performa Stainless Steel fry pans and saute pans feature the Techno Release raised pattern on the pan's interior for easier release of food and easier cleanup. Minimal effort should restore pans to their original beauty. All Performa cookware is constructed of premium quality 18/10 stainless steel and is compatible with all cooktops, including induction. The riveted stainless steel handles provide an ergonomic and secure grip. Performa Stainless Steel cookware is also dishwasher safe and oven safe. Vented glass lids make it convenient to monitor the cooking process. Preparing delicious meals with stainless steel has never been easier. Performa cookware is covered by a Lifetime Limited Warranty. The Set includes: 8" Fry Pan, 10.5" Fry Pan, 1qt Covered Saucepan, 3qt Covered Saucepan, 5qt Covered Dutch Oven, 4 Measuring Spoons.
